import React ,{useState} from 'react' export const Home = () => { const [modal,setModal]= useState({ fname:'', password:'', email:'' }) const onModalSubmit=()=>{ const modalItem = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('popup')) if(modalItem){ modalItem.push(modal) localStorage.setItem("popup",JSON.stringify(modalItem)) }else{ localStorage.setItem("popup",JSON.stringify([modal])); } setModal({ fname:"", password:'', email:'' }) } return ( <>
Navbar
New message
setModal({...modal,fname:e.target.value})} />
setModal({...modal,email:e.target.value})} />
setModal({...modal,password:e.target.value})} />
{/* Card value */} { modal.map((item)=>{ return (
List
  • {item.fname}
  • {item.email}
  • {item.password}
) }) }
) }
